description:
The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who`s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Luluka Island
Niji-iro no Kiri Densetsu! Ruluka Tou no Roujin Henzo
Une brume mystérieuse aux couleurs arc-en-ciel... Henzo, le vieil homme de l`île de Ruruka
Легенда радужного тумана! Старик Хензо с острова Рулука!
أسطورة ضباب قوس قزح! جزيرة لولوكا والعجوز هينزو
ตำนานหมอกสีรุ้ง ลุงเฮนโซแห่งเกาะลูลูกะ
虹色の霧伝説! ルルカ島[とう]の老人ヘンゾ
